name: Flappy Text
description:
This is a text based version of the super popular Flappy Bird.

I made this with 4 of my friends in computer programming class. Please consider donating to support DodgeCoding so that we can make more games in the future.

The game itself is free but its highly recommended that you pay at least $1 to help us here at DodgeCoding. And for $5 you can get to see the main piece of source code that allows this game to run (Note that not all of the source code is included)

You can follow development of my next game called Flappy Tubers here: https://www.patreon.com/DodgeCoding
